review: works great...just wish the Prime membership had more free movies and TV channels. Really better with Netflix or something. Better if the fire stick worked more like on demand and you could watch TV shows that just happened. But overall good. Easy to navigate, not glitch and good price.
author: Jaimie C Tirado

review: I searched a great deal on these things and everywhere the Fire TV Stick came up. There is still a lot I do not understand and I'm sure a lot of you out there do, wish I did, but I decided one day to just order this and give it a try. I am not a rich person but I am home a lot and I enjoy watching TV. This was easy to install and worked right off the bat. Can't say I understand any more than before but I do get to watch a lot of movies I didn't have to buy. I am hoping and waiting for the day when I can have this for every tv in the house and I can shut off the high priced cable bill. Thank you Amazon !

review: The only reason I still have this piece of crap is that it was a gift. I've been a roku user for a few years.  The amazon fire device is much more difficult to set up,  the user interface is a mess,  and there are hardly any channels available.  About the only thing it is good for is to watch amazon prime content - which I can do equally well on my roku.  I'm planning to buy another roku to replace it.
author: Suzanne Holter

review: The Fire TV Stick is an awesome device!  Not only did it meet, but it exceeded my expectations.  Its very easy to use, and there are a world of apps available for download.  Overall i would recommend this device to everyone.  Its a must have.
